name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Bears, Beets, Battlestar Galactica: The Office
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Bears, Beets, Battlestar Galactica: The Office
long_desc: Be ready to face any challenges that might be foolish enough to face you. Analyze and discuss different character arcs, hidden messages, and relationships in the office. Study the impact that these have had on our individual lives and society as a whole. What life lessons can we take from this iconic tv show It is recommended that you have seen and have a basic understanding of characters and plot lines from The Office.

custom_fields.goals: We hope to have students leave this course with both a greater understanding of The Office as well as a workplace dynamic. Students will learn about how actions impact other people, as well as the signs of a healthy relationship.
custom_fields.key_topics: This course will cover character arcs, hidden messages, and relationships in The Office. We will examine both the impact that characters had on each other as well as on our own lives.
custom_fields.prerequisite_knowledge: A basic knowledge of characters and plot lines in The Office (there will be spoilers).
custom_fields.assessment_structure: Students will be graded on a weekly basis, completing weekly homework assignments worth 20% of their grade, a midterm worth 20%, and a final worth 20%. The remaining 40% of their grade will come from attendance and participation.
custom_fields.relevance: This course is designed for anyone interested in The Office who feels as though it impacted their lives.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Students will have access to Canvas, web pages, slides presented during class.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Students will further discuss the themes and character arcs that we will be discussing in class. They will be expected to expand beyond our class discussion and submit writing to show their thought process.
